abstract: Inside the ThinkPad Reserve is an Intel Centrino Pro processor and the Lenovo Ultra Connect II system for cellular and Wi-Fi networking.
snippet: Inside the ThinkPad Reserve is an Intel Centrino Pro processor and the Lenovo Ultra Connect II system for cellular and Wi-Fi networking.
lead_paragraph: Laptops do not age well. Their screens dim and their hard drives sputter and eventually they are put to pasture. With its new ThinkPad Reserve, Lenovo is trying for something a little more timeless.

headline.main: For $5,000, This Laptop Comes With Leather, Technical Support and a Certain Cachet
headline.print_headline: For $5,000, This Laptop Comes With Leather, Technical Support and a Certain Cachet
